CustomField.description: If configured, Timecards for this Milestone will inherit this Bill Rate. In order for this to happen, the default-timecard-bill-rate-from-milestone Milestone config must be true (default false) and the 'Apply Default Bill Rate to Timecard' checkbox on the Milestone must be checked. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If configured, Timecards for this Milestone will inherit this Bill Rate. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project.
CustomField.label: Default Bill Rate
